s1 desc: <span class="tooltip" >20% boost<span class="tooltiptext" style="">'''Size:''' Big<hr /> '''Modifier:''' Normal</span></span> to bow-specialty allies' ATK<br /><span class="tooltip" >10% boost<span class="tooltiptext" style="">'''Size:''' Big</span></span> to bow-specialty allies' HP
s2 desc: A gate to the summits of power locked within ultima weapons.<br />These gates can only be opened with gauph keys.

name: Maverick
ca1 desc: Massive Fire DMG to a foe.<br />All allies gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_CriticalUp.png|25px|link=Status Effects#Critical Hit Rate Boosted]][[Status Effects#Critical Hit Rate Boosted|80%? / 20% Critical Hit Rate Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">DMG is slightly boosted for critical hits<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 80%? chance of dealing 20% more damage.<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3.5 turns<span class="hr"></span><strong>Stacking</strong>: Does not stack with Tweyen<span class="hr"></span>[[Half_Turns|Applied during the attack phase.]]<br />On the next turn, it'll have 3 turns remaining.</span></span></span>
s1 desc: When main weapon: Also grants <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Uplift.png|25px|link=Charge Bar Gain Boosted]][[Charge Bar Gain Boosted|Charge Bar Gain Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">[[Charge bar]] gain is boosted<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: +5% for every action<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns<span class="hr"></span>On every attack, C.A., damage incurred (even if 0), or dodge; Charge bar will be increased by 5%.</span></span></span> for 3 turns and <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Substitute.png|25px|link=Substitute]][[Substitute|Substitute]]<span class="tooltiptext">Receives foe attack in place of an ally<br />(Excludes all-foe all-ally attacks)<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 1 turn </span></span></span> for 1 turn upon using <span class="image_link">[[File: Ability m 313_1.png|25px|link=Nighthound#Extended_Mastery_Skills]]&nbsp;<span class="tooltip" >[[Nighthound#Extended_Mastery_Skills|Evasive Maneuvers]]<span class="tooltiptext" style=""><span>800% elemental damage to a foe.<br />gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_AttackUp.png|25px|link=Status Effects#ATK Boosted]][[Status Effects#ATK Boosted|100% ATK Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">ATK is boosted<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 100%<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 1 turn </span></span></span>, <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_DefenseUp.png|25px|link=Status Effects#Dodge All]][[Status Effects#Dodge All|Dodge All]]<span class="tooltiptext">Takes no DMG or debuffs while in effect<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 1 turn </span></span></span>, and <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_EffectOnDodge.png|25px|link=Status Effects#Bonus Effect on Dodge]][[Status Effects#Bonus Effect on Dodge|Bonus Effect on Dodge]]<span class="tooltiptext">Blind foes upon dodging<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 1 turn <span class="hr"></span>Will deal large damage and inflict blind on all foes.</span></span></span>.</span></span></span></span>.
s2 desc: This is the essence of greatness. Gain its power by using emblems.
